languages.text: "Гончая" — третья карта в раскладе. И тоже перевернута. Кто-то выбрал тебя своей жертвой и гонит по полю капканов. "Потерянное дитя" говорит, что в один из капканов ты прыгнешь по собственной воле, поверив тому, кто отчаялся".

"The third... The Hound, inverted. Someone has marked you as their prey and is chasing you through a field of traps. The Lost Child... you will leap into one of those traps of your own free will, and place your trust in someone truly desperate."
languages.original_text: "Гончая" — третья карта в раскладе. И тоже перевернута. Кто-то выбрал тебя своей жертвой и гонит по полю капканов. "Потерянное дитя" говорит, что в один из капканов ты прыгнешь по собственной воле, поверив тому, кто отчаялся".

traits.locale_text: "The third... The Hound. Inverted. Someone has marked you as their prey and is chasing you across a field of traps. The Lost Child. You will leap into one of those traps of your own free will, after trusting one who is desperate."

"The third... The Hound. Inverted. Someone has marked you as their prey and is chasing you through a field of traps. The Lost Child... you will leap into one of those traps of your own free will, and place your trust in someone truly desperate."

languages.text: «La tercera es... El Sabueso, invertido. Alguien le ha marcado como su presa y le está dando caza en una zona infestada de trampas. El Niño perdido... usted se arrojará deliberadamente a una de esas trampas y depositará su confianza en alguien que es presa de la desesperación».
languages.original_text: "The third... The Hound, inverted. Someone has marked you as their prey and is chasing you through a field of traps. The Lost Child... you will leap into one of those traps of your own free will, and place your trust in someone truly desperate."

traits.locale_text: «La tercera es... El Perro. Invertido. Alguien le ha marcado como su presa y le está dando caza en una zona infestada de trampas. El Niño perdido... usted se arrojará deliberadamente a una de esas trampas y depositará su confianza en alguien que es presa de la desesperación».

languages.text: 「3番目…猟犬。逆位置。誰かがあなたを獲物として目を付け、罠だらけの場所で追いかけている。喪われた子供…あなたは自らの意思で罠の一つに飛び込み、真に切迫している誰かに信頼を置くことになる」
languages.original_text: "The third... The Hound, inverted. Someone has marked you as their prey and is chasing you through a field of traps. The Lost Child... you will leap into one of those traps of your own free will, and place your trust in someone truly desperate."

traits.locale_text: 「3番目…猟犬。逆位置。誰かがあなたを獲物として目を付け、罠だらけの場所で追いかけている。喪われた子供…あなたは自らの意思で罠の一つに飛び込み、真に切迫している誰かに信頼を置くことになる」
「3番目…猟犬。逆位置。誰かがあなたを獲物として目を付け、罠だらけの場所で追いかけている。喪われた子供…あなたは自らの意思で罠の一つに飛び込み、真に切迫している誰かに信頼を置くことになる」

languages.text: “第三张牌是……逆位猎犬，有人把你当成了猎物，准备引诱你落入陷阱之中。第四张牌是……正位迷失孩童，你将会出于自己的意愿，亲自跳入其中一个陷阱，将你的信任寄托在某个彻底走投无路的人身上。”
languages.original_text: "The third... The Hound, inverted. Someone has marked you as their prey and is chasing you through a field of traps. The Lost Child... you will leap into one of those traps of your own free will, and place your trust in someone truly desperate."

traits.locale_text: “第三张牌是……逆位猎犬，有人把你当成了猎物，准备引诱你落入陷阱之中。第四张牌是……正位迷失孩童，你将会出于自己的意愿，亲自跳入其中一个陷阱，将你的信任寄托在某个彻底走投无路的人身上。”
“第三张牌是……逆位猎犬，有人把你当成了猎物，准备引诱你落入陷阱之中。第四张牌是……正位迷失孩童，你将会出于自己的意愿，亲自跳入其中一个陷阱，将你的信任寄托在某个彻底走投无路的人身上。”

languages.text: "Die dritte ... Der Hund, umgedreht. Jemand hat Euch als Beute auserkoren und verfolgt Euch durch ein Feld voller Fallen. Das Verlorene Kind ... Ihr werdet freiwillig in eine dieser Fallen gehen und auf jemanden vertrauen, der wahrhaft verzweifelt ist."
languages.original_text: "The third... The Hound, inverted. Someone has marked you as their prey and is chasing you through a field of traps. The Lost Child... you will leap into one of those traps of your own free will, and place your trust in someone truly desperate."

traits.locale_text: "Die dritte ... Der Hund. Umgedreht. Jemand hat Euch als Beute auserkoren und verfolgt Euch durch ein Feld voller Fallen. Das Verlorene Kind ... Ihr werdet freiwillig in eine dieser Fallen gehen und auf jemanden vertrauen, der wahrhaft verzweifelt ist."

"Die dritte ... Der Hund. Umgedreht. Jemand hat Euch als Beute auserkoren und verfolgt Euch durch ein Feld voller Fallen. Das Verlorene Kind ... Ihr werdet freiwillig in eine dieser Fallen gehen und auf jemanden vertrauen, der wahrhaft verzweifelt ist."

languages.text: « La troisième... Le Molosse inversé. Quelqu'un vous a {mf|désigné|désignée} comme sa proie et vous traque à travers un lacis de pièges. L'Enfant perdue... vous vous jetterez volontairement dans l'un de ces rets et vous accorderez votre confiance à un individu désespéré. »
languages.original_text: "The third... The Hound, inverted. Someone has marked you as their prey and is chasing you through a field of traps. The Lost Child... you will leap into one of those traps of your own free will, and place your trust in someone truly desperate."

languages.text: "Üçüncüsü... Tazı, ters. Birisi seni avı olarak işaretlemiş ve tuzaklarla dolu bir yerde kovalıyor. Kayıp Çocuk... O tuzaklardan birine kendi isteğinle atlayıp gerçekten çaresiz birine bel bağlayacaksın."
languages.original_text: "The third... The Hound, inverted. Someone has marked you as their prey and is chasing you through a field of traps. The Lost Child... you will leap into one of those traps of your own free will, and place your trust in someone truly desperate."
